name: GDC Speaker Simulator
description:
Welcome to GDC. You have been invited to give the opening keynote speech. This "once in a lifetime" opportunity could make or break your career. Don't screw up!

Test your knowledge of game design terminology and try to keep your job. Will you change the world with your speech or will you go down in the flames of game development history? The speech is yours. 

Submission to the NotGDC Jam 2020
